pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with British Columbia Premier John Horgan | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Yesterday, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau spoke with British Columbia Premier John Horgan about the COVID-19 pandemic and the many actions federal, provincial, and territorial governments are taking to keep people safe and healthy, including investments in vaccines, contact tracing, and public service announcements.

They discussed the need for people to remain close to home and avoid non-essential travel in the coming weeks to reduce the spread of the virus. 

The Prime Minister and the Premier agreed to continue working closely together in the months ahead.
